text: The Culicomorpha are an infraorder of Nematocera, including mosquitoes, black flies, and several extant and extinct families of insects. ==Classification== Extant families * Superfamily Culicoidea ** Dixidae -meniscus midges ** Corethrellidae -frog-biting midges ** Chaoboridae -phantom midges ** Culicidae -mosquitoes * Superfamily Chironomoidea ** Thaumaleidae -solitary midges ** Simuliidae -black flies and buffalo gnats ** Ceratopogonidae -biting midges ** Chironomidae -nonbiting midges Extinct families * Asiochaoboridae (Upper Jurassic) * Architendipedidae (Upper Triassic) * Protendipedidae (Middle Jurassic) * Mesophantasmatidae (Middle Jurassic) Category:Insect infraorders
title: Culicomorpha
